subtotal.description: The amount of currency paid for the exchange, excluding fees

fee.description: The amount of currency paid in fees

total.description: The total amount of currency to be paid in or paid out. It is always a sum of subtotal and fee

link.description: Link to allow Alice to pay PFI, or be paid by the PFI

instruction.description: Instruction on how Alice can pay PFI, or how Alice can be paid by the PFI

expiresAt.description: When this quote expires. Expressed as ISO8601

payoutUnitsPerPayinUnit.description: The exchange rate to convert from payin currency to payout currency. Expressed as an unrounded decimal string.
